entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Attawapiskat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:38 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -23.0°C

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
